sentences.en: a free booklet on drug abuse
sentences.cn: 关于嗜毒问题的免费小册子

sentences.en: Detailed instructions are included in the booklet.
Exhibitor list and its brief introduction on the Expo booklet.
sentences.cn: 会刊刊登参展商名录及简介.

sentences.en: For fund information, please refer to related fund option booklet.
sentences.cn: 有关基金资料, 请参阅相关的基金选择小册子.

sentences.en: I picked up a free booklet on tooth care at the dentist's.
sentences.cn: 我在牙医那里拿了一本关于牙齿保健的免费小册子.

sentences.en: I think it would be simpler if I sent you our booklet on conference hotels.
sentences.cn: 要是我送你一份有关会议宾馆的手册的话,那么事情就会简单多了.

sentences.en: In 1828 Green published a privately printed booklet.
sentences.cn: 1828年格林出版了一本私人印刷的小册子.

sentences.en: It would be simpler if I sent you our booklet on conference hotels.
sentences.cn: 要是我送给你一本关于会议宾馆方面的小册子的话,事情就简间多了.

sentences.en: Read this extract from an information booklet about the work of an airline cabin crew.
sentences.cn: 看看这段从有关航空公司乘务人员工作的信息手册中摘录的文字。

sentences.en: The booklet initiates us into the problems of living abroad.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子使我们对国外的生活情况有了初步了解.

sentences.en: The booklet is very practical and handy of reference.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子很实用,而且便于查考.

sentences.en: The contents of this booklet should be of use to all students.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子的内容应该会对所有的学生都有用处。

sentences.en: The newly published booklet breaks down into three parts.
sentences.cn: 这本新出版的小册子分成三部分.

sentences.en: This booklet restricts itself to facts without frills.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子只谈事实，绝无矫饰。

sentences.en: While this booklet has become an official source of information, it is filled with misstatements of fact.
sentences.cn: 尽管这本小册子已经成为正式的信息来源，里面仍然错误百出。

sentences.en: You can wise up on details by reading this booklet.
sentences.cn: 读了这本小册子你就知道详细情况了.

trans.tran_en: a very short book that usually contains information on one particular subject
